summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 22.900.170, 22.900.180, 22.900.220, 22.900.230, 22.900.240, 22.900.250, 22.900.260 of the Permit Fee Ordinance (113744) to reduce Energy code fees, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Construction and Land Use Operating Fund for Energy Code training and technical assistance.
